GPP_NT_FLUXNET.nameLong: Gross Primary Production - from Nighttime partitioning method - based on NEE_VUT_USTAR50

GPP_DT_FLUXNET.nameLong: Gross Primary Production - from Daytime partitioning method - based on NEE_VUT_USTAR50

NEE_FLUXNET.nameLong: Net Ecosystem Exchange - using Variable Ustar Threshold (VUT) for each year - from 50 percentile of USTAR threshold

NEE_RANDUNC_weighted_FLUXNET.nameLong: Net Ecosystem Exchange random uncertainty weighted by number of original observations

NEE_QC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for NEE_FLUXNET, fraction of good or measured values (level 0 or 1)

RECO_NT_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of Ecosystem Respiration - from Nighttime partitioning method - based on NEE_VUT_USTAR50

RECO_DT_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of Ecosystem Respiration - from Daytime partitioning method - based on NEE_VUT_USTAR50

LE_RANDUNC_weighted_FLUXNET.nameLong: Latent heatflux random uncertainty weighted by number of original observations

LE_QC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for LE_FLUXNET, fraction of good or measured values (level 0 or 1)

H_RANDUNC_weighted_FLUXNET.nameLong: Sensible heatflux random uncertainty weighted by number of original observations

H_QC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for H_FLUXNET, fraction of good or measured values (level 0 or 1)

SWC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Soil water content - depth=1: shallow layer, depth=2:deep layer

SWC_QC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for SWC_FLUXNET, fraction of good or measured values (level 0 or 1) - depth=1: shallow layer, depth=2:deep layer

TS_FLUXNET.nameLong: Soil temperature - depth=1: shallow layer, depth=2:deep layer

TS_QC_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for TS_FLUXNET, fraction of good or measured values (level 0 or 1) - depth=1: shallow layer, depth=2:deep layer

TA_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of air temperature - gapfilled using MDS method

TA_QC_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for TA_DayMean_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

P_QC_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for P_DayMean_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

VPD_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of Vapor Pressure Deficit - gapfilled using MDS method

VPD_QC_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for VPD_DayMean_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

SW_IN_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of Shortwave radiation - incoming - gapfilled using MDS (negative values set to zero - e.g. - negative values from instrumentation noise

SW_IN_QC_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for SW_IN_DayMean_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

SW_IN_POT_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Daily mean of potential Shortwave radiation - incoming

NETRAD_QC_DayMean_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for NETRAD_DayMean_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

TA_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: DayTime mean of air temperature - gapfilled using MDS method

TA_QC_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for TA_DayTime_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

VPD_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: DayTime mean of Vapor Pressure Deficit - gapfilled using MDS method

VPD_QC_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for VPD_DayTime_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

SW_IN_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: DayTime mean of Shortwave radiation - incoming - gapfilled using MDS (negative values set to zero - e.g. - negative values from instrumentation noise

SW_IN_QC_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for SW_IN_DayTime_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

SW_IN_POT_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: DayTime mean of potential Shortwave radiation - incoming

NETRAD_QC_DayTime_FLUXNET.nameLong: Quality flag for NETRAD_DayTime_FLUXNET, fraction of measured values (level 0 or 1)

TA_DayMean_ERA5.nameLong: Daily mean of air temperature - ERA5 downscaling

VPD_DayMean_ERA5.nameLong: Daily mean of Vapor Pressure Deficit - ERA5 downscaling

SW_IN_DayMean_ERA5.nameLong: Daily mean of Shortwave radiation - incoming - ERA5 downscaling

SW_IN_POT_DayMean_ERA5.nameLong: Daily mean of potential Shortwave radiation - incoming - ERA5 downscaling

NETRAD_DayMean_ERA5.nameLong: Daily mean of Net radiation- ERA5 downscaling

TA_DayTime_ERA5.nameLong: DayTime mean of Air temperature - ERA5 downscaling

VPD_DayTime_ERA5.nameLong: DayTime mean of Vapor Pressure Deficit - ERA5 downscaling

SW_IN_DayTime_ERA5.nameLong: DayTime mean of Shortwave radiation - incoming - ERA5 downscaling

SW_IN_POT_DayTime_ERA5.nameLong: DayTime mean of potential Shortwave radiation - incoming - ERA5 downscaling

NETRAD_DayTime_ERA5.nameLong: DayTime mean of Net radiation- ERA5 downscaling

T_NT_75_Nelson2018.nameLong: Daily mean of transpiration - from Nighttime partitioning method - quantile 75

T_DT_75_Nelson2018.nameLong: Daily mean of transpiration - from Daytime partitioning method - quantile 75

NDVI_MCD43A.nameLong: Normalized difference vegetation index - Derived from MCD43A version 6

kNDVI_MCD43A.nameLong: kernel Normalized difference vegetation index - Derived from MCD43A version 6

EVI_MCD43A.nameLong: Enhanced vegetation index - Derived from MCD43A version 6

NDWI_MCD43A.nameLong: Normalized difference water index - Derived from MCD43A version 6

LST_DayMean_AQUA_MxD11A.nameLong: Land Surface Temperature DayMean AQUA calculated as an average between LST Day and Night - Derived from MxD11A version 6

LST_DayMean_TERRA_MxD11A.nameLong: Land Surface Temperature DayMean TERRA calculated as an average between LST Day and Night - Derived from MxD11A version 6

LST_DayTime_AQUA_MxD11A.nameLong: Land Surface Temperature DayTime AQUA calculated from LST Day - Derived from MxD11A version 6

LST_DayTime_TERRA_MxD11A.nameLong: Land Surface Temperature DayTime TERRA calculated from LST Day - Derived from MxD11A version 6

AG_BIOMASS_TT_gloBbiomass.nameLong: Above-ground biomass from gloBbiomass product calculated as the median of 5x5 pxiels 100m around the tower location

TREECOVER_hansen.nameLong: Percentage of tree cover from Hansen data calculated as the median values of 5x5 30m pixels

DIST_FOREST_FRAC_Besnard2018.nameLong: Occurence of disturbance event - 0: occurence 1: no occurence

AWCh1_SoilGrids.nameLong: Available soil water capacity (volumetric fraction) with FC = pF 2.0 - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

AWCh2_SoilGrids.nameLong: Available soil water capacity (volumetric fraction) with FC = pF 2.3 - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

AWCh3_SoilGrids.nameLong: Available soil water capacity (volumetric fraction) with FC = pF 2.5 - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

AWCtS_SoilGrids.nameLong: tetaS: saturated water content - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

BLDFIE_SoilGrids.nameLong: Bulk density (fine earth) - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

CECSOL_SoilGrids.nameLong: Cation Exchange Capacity of soil - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

CLYPPT_SoilGrids.nameLong: Weight percentage of the clay particles (<0.0002 mm) - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

CRFVOL_SoilGrids.nameLong: Volumetric percentage of coarse fragments (>2 mm) - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

OCSTHA_SoilGrids.nameLong: Soil organic carbon stock - Standard depth: depth=1: 0-5cm, depth=2: 5-15cm, depth=3: 15-30cm, depth=4: 30-60cm, depth=5: 60-100cm, depth=6: 100-200cm

ORCDRC_SoilGrids.nameLong: Soil organic carbon content - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

PHIHOX_SoilGrids.nameLong: pH index measured in water solution - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

PHIKCL_SoilGrids.nameLong: pH index measured in KCl solution - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

SLTPPT_SoilGrids.nameLong: Weight percentage of the silt particles (0.00020.05 mm) - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

SNDPPT_SoilGrids.nameLong: Weight percentage of the sand particles (0.052 mm) - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

WWP_SoilGrids.nameLong: Available soil water capacity (volumetric fraction) until wilting point - depth=1: 0cm, depth=2: 5cm, depth=3: 15cm, depth=4: 30cm, depth=5: 60cm, depth=6: 100cm, depth=7: 200cm

Frac_grass_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of grass - 0: no grass and 1: only grass

Frac_shrub_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of shrub - 0: no shrub and 1: only shrub

Frac_tree_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of tree - 0: no tree and 1: only tree

Frac_crop_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of crop - 0: no crop and 1: only crop

Frac_savanna_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of savanna - 0: no savanna and 1: only savanna

Frac_wetland_insitu.nameLong: Fraction of wetland - 0: no wetland and 1: only wetland

Frac_grass_hilda.nameLong: Fraction of grass (class 33: Pasture) - 0: no grass and 1: only grass
Frac_grass_hilda.publication: https://landchangestories.org/hildaplus/; Winkler et al., (under review, GCB)

Frac_shrub_hilda.nameLong: Fraction of shrub (class 55: Grass/shrubland) - 0: no shrub and 1: only shrub
Frac_shrub_hilda.publication: https://landchangestories.org/hildaplus/; Winkler et al., (under review, GCB)

Frac_tree_hilda.nameLong: Fraction of tree (class 40: Unknown/Other, 41: Evergreen needle leaf, 42: Evergreen broad leaf, 43: Deciduous needle leaf, 44: Deciduous broad leaf 45: Mixed) - 0: no tree and 1: only tree
Frac_tree_hilda.publication: https://landchangestories.org/hildaplus/; Winkler et al., (under review, GCB)

Frac_crop_hilda.nameLong: Fraction of crop (class 22: Cropland) - 0: no crop and 1: only crop
Frac_crop_hilda.publication: https://landchangestories.org/hildaplus/; Winkler et al., (under review, GCB)

Frac_other_hilda.nameLong: Fraction of other land (class 66: Other land) - 0: no other and 1: only other
Frac_other_hilda.publication: https://landchangestories.org/hildaplus/; Winkler et al., (under review, GCB)
